message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and I think it would be a great value for you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping for something closer to my original asking price. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a significant discount and I believe it's a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $12,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
